parameters.name: identityId
parameters.description: Id of the identity, to which document will be linked

DocumentFront.description: An image of the front of the ID. For passports, the front is the page containing the user's name and photograph.

DocumentBack.description: An image of the back of the ID. This parameter is optional for the passport but required for others documents.

SelfPortrait.description: A self-portrait of the user for facial recognition. This parameter is optional and can be used as an additional data point for verification.

Bearer.description:
Put access token in the box below.
For example: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6I
Bearer.name: Authorization
